name: fullautoagent
description: A configurable OpenCode plugin that turns task checklists into a fully automated workflow. It initializes a project-local orchestration system with editable prompts, state management, and per-step CLI command sequences. The plugin runs an event-driven state machine (pick → plan → implement → review → done), executes steps autonomously, writes structured artifacts, and allows users to customize every stage of the pipeline while preserving deterministic, recoverable automation.
